channel.title: Hosting A Server Online
channel.description:
Quick question, I got my own little server going and I did not need to port foward. I just clicked run server, went to whatsmyip.org, put it on MoparScape, and my server worked.
I currently have a web host with a cPanel and all that I am paying for, it says it is Linux... what do I need to do, to get the server running off the server?
So like I have a folder so its server.SERVERNAME.COM and files are in it, but how do I start the server?

item.title: Hosting A Server Online
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“xchr0nicx, post:3, topic:354194”]Ok. So I cannot host it on there.

Well I can self-host it… but theres no way to get it hosted for free?[/quote]

There are VPS 30 day trials that can be found with a simple google search. But you need working credit card info.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting A Server Online
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

That’s a webhost not a VPS people means your paying for a forums or something. (Website) (Webhost=Website Hoster)

Read full topic
